statements: SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM chart_of_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_balance < 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Asset' ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type, account_balance FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Income' ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_balance FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0 ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_type, COUNT(*) AS num_accounts FROM chart_of_accounts GROUP BY account_type;
SELECT account_name, SUM(account_balance) AS total_balance FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Revenue';
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM chart_of_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM journal_entries WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_name, account_type, COUNT(account_id) AS num_accounts FROM chart_of_accounts GROUP BY account_type ORDER BY num_accounts DESC;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Income';
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;

SELECT account_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM chart_of_accounts c JOIN journal_entries j ON c.account_id = j.account_id GROUP BY account_name HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_name LIKE '%Expense%' OR account_type = 'Liability' ORDER BY account_type, account_id;
SELECT * FROM journal_entries WHERE entry_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY entry_date ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM chart_of_accounts JOIN account_balances ON chart_of_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id WHERE balance > 10000;
SELECT account_name, transaction_type, amount FROM chart_of_accounts JOIN transactions ON chart_of_accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM chart_of_accounts JOIN account_balances ON chart_of_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id WHERE account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Income' ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT a.account_id, a.account_name, b.balance FROM chart_of_accounts a JOIN account_balances b ON a.account_id = b.account_id WHERE b.balance < 0 ORDER BY b.balance ASC;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts;
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT group_name FROM account_groups ORDER BY group_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM chart_of_accounts INNER JOIN account_balances ON chart_of_accounts.account_id = account_balances.account_id WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM account_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_type = 'Asset';
SELECT account_name, account_type FROM chart_of_accounts WHERE account_id < 10 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM account_transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT a.account_name, b.group_name FROM chart_of_accounts a JOIN account_groups b ON a.account_id = b.group_id WHERE a.account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT * FROM account_balances WHERE balance > 500 ORDER BY account_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ChartOfAccounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM ChartOfAccounts WHERE account_type = 'Income';
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM ChartOfAccounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT subaccount_id, subaccount_name, subaccount_type FROM SubAccounts WHERE account_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM ChartOfAccounts WHERE account_type = 'Expense';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM ChartOfAccounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM ChartOfAccounts WHERE account_type = 'Income' AND balance BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM ChartOfAccounts;
SELECT COA.account_name, Ledger.credit_amount FROM ChartOfAccounts COA JOIN Ledger ON COA.account_id = Ledger.account_id WHERE Ledger.credit_amount > 0 ORDER BY Ledger.credit_amount DESC;
